Translations.Text: Fastajaba Lahum Rabbuhum 'Anni La 'Uđi`u `Amala `Amilin Minkum Min Dhakarin 'Aw 'Untha Ba`đukum Min Ba`đin Fa-Al-Ladhina Hajaru Wa 'Ukhriju Min Diyarihim Wa 'Udhu Fi Sabili Wa Qatalu Wa Qutilu La'ukaffiranna `Anhum Sayyi'atihim Wa La'udkhilannahum Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Thawabaan Min `Indi Allahi Wa Allahu `Indahu Husnu Ath-Thawabi
La Yaghurrannaka Taqallubu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fi Al-Biladi
Mata`un Qalilun Thumma Ma'wahum Jahannamu Wa Bi'sa Al-Mihadu
Lakini Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Rabbahum Lahum Jannatun Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Nuzulaan Min `Indi Allahi Wa Ma `Inda Allahi Khayrun Lil'abrari

Wa 'Inna Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Laman Yu'uminu Billahi Wa Ma 'Unzila 'Ilaykum Wa Ma 'Unzila 'Ilayhim Khashi`ina Lillahi La Yashtaruna Bi'ayati Allahi Thamanaan Qalilaan 'Ula'ika Lahum 'Ajruhum `Inda Rabbihim 'Inna Allaha Sari`u Al-Hisabi
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Asbiru Wa Sabiru Wa Rabitu Wa Attaqu Allaha La`allakum Tuflihuna
